message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $14,000. I believe it will bring you significant value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  However, $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, I'm looking for a price closer to $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at that price?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $13,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is my final offer, as I'm ready to move on if we can't find common ground.
